about_section.js_animation_library: Currently building an AI Chat Bot

projects_section.title: A small selection of recent projects

project1.title: Amazon Competitors Reporting
project1.description: This app conducts deep competitor research and uses AI to identify key differentiators, offering actionable insights for improvement. It also analyzes media assets and generates high-quality, AI-crafted product visuals that can serve as creative references or ready-to-use marketing materials.

project2.title: Intelligent Samples - MrSampler
project2.description: This desktop app uses AI to analyze audio files and automatically tag them by genre, mood, instruments, and energy level. It helps producers and sound designers organize and discover their sounds instantly, turning chaotic sample folders into a smart, searchable audio library.

project3.title: Portfolio Website
project3.description: This portfolio website highlights key business strengths while seamlessly blending AI-generated content with modern design. It organizes visual styles and animations to create an engaging, intelligent showcase of creativity and technology.

project4.title: API Key Management System
project4.description: A modern API key management system built with Next.js and Supabase, featuring secure key generation, usage tracking, and role-based access control.

testimonial1.text: Working with Yana was an absolute pleasure. She combined creativity with AI to build a smart audio library that analyzes and tags my samples automatically. The app makes it super easy to find the right sounds fast - it’s a huge time saver in my music production workflow.
testimonial1.author: Hoa Nguyen

testimonial2.text: Yana built a competitor analysis platform for my e-commerce business that saved me countless hours of manual research. Every idea I shared was understood and implemented thoughtfully — she’s very agile, responsive, and always one step ahead in improving the product. Great work!
testimonial2.author: Kim Cruickshanks
testimonial2.role: Founder & CEO of Cooking Gift Set Co

testimonial3.text: Yana's proactive, detail-oriented, and great to work with — always finding smart ways to make testing smoother. She was a key part of our QA team. She built solid automation with Cypress and TypeScript, quickly improving our test coverage and release speed.
testimonial3.author: Aleksandra Mocek

job1.title: QA Automation Engineer Intern - Andersen
job1.description: Automated quality assurance processes for a CRM web platform.

job2.title: QA Automation Engineer Mid - Clearcode
job2.description: Assisted in the development of an ad-tech platforms, enhancing quality and user experience.

job3.title: Team Lead QA Automation Engineer - Avenga
job3.description: Led the e2e automation of a ad-tech platform, from initial concept to deployment.

job4.title: Freelance Web Developer
job4.description: AI consulting, developing and deploying websites and apps for e-commerce, ad-tech and finance.

phase1.back_description: We start by discussing your vision and goals. I'll create a detailed project plan and timeline to ensure we're aligned every step of the way.

phase2.back_description: Once we agree on the plan, I cue my lofi playlist and dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.

phase3.back_description: After thorough testing, I'll deploy the project. We'll review the final product together to ensure it meets your expectations and discuss any final tweaks.

call_to_action_section.title: Ready to take your digital presence to the next level?
